name: Awakening Aliens - 3D Alien Resurgence Shooter
description:
Get ready for war! It's the year 2041, and the world is in the final stages of fighting off an alien invasion. You are the last line of defence. If you can hold them off, you will save the world? Are you up for the challenge?!

FEATURES

- Awesome 3D rendered graphics.
- Cool alien creatures.
- Rocking sound track.
